(Simplified: 钴)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 古 indicates the sound; 釒 (metal) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 釒 [ jīn ] gold, metal; money
    • 古 [ gǔ ] old, classic, ancient
①一種金屬元素。鈷的放射性同位素鈷60在機械、化工、冶金等方面都有廣泛的應用，在醫療上可以代替鐳治療癌症。
鈷鉧 [ gǔ mǔ ]: (literary) clothes iron

鈷字的基本解释

鈷
gǔ
见“钴”。

鈷字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gǔ］
［《廣韻》公户切，上姥，見。］
“钴1”的繁体字。
(1)见“鈷”。
(2)金属元素，符号Co。灰白色的结晶，物理性质和化学性质很像铁，用来制造特种钢和超耐热合金，也可做玻璃和瓷器的蓝颜料。放射性钴能代替镭来治疗恶性肿瘤。
[②]［hú］
［《集韻》洪孤切，平模，匣。］
“钴2”的繁体字。
古代宗庙里盛黍稷的礼器。

鈷字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鈷； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1299第31
【廣韻】【集韻】?公戸切，音古。【玉篇】鈷䥈也。　又【集韻】洪孤切，音胡。盛黍稷器名。同瑚。本作鍸。　又【集韻】古慕切，音顧。斷也。

cobalt
Basic explanation of words
cobalt

See "Cobalt".
cobalt
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [gǔ]
["Guangyun" public account cut, grandma, see you. ]
Traditional characters for "cobalt 1".
(1) See "Cobalt ".
(2) Metal element, symbol Co. The off-white crystals are very similar to iron in physical and chemical properties. They are used to make special steels and super heat-resistant alloys. They can also be used as blue pigments for glass and porcelain. Radioactive cobalt can replace radium to treat malignant tumors.
[②]［hú］
["Jiyun" Hong Guqie, flat mold, box. ]
Traditional characters for "cobalt 2".
A ritual vessel used to hold millet in the ancient ancestral temple.
cobalt
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Su Ji 1】【Golden Word Department】　Co; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 1299 31
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Gongdo cut, sound ancient. 【Jade articles】Cobalt also.　[Jiyun] Hong Guqie, Yinhu. The name of the Sheng millet ware. Tonghu. This is a deer.　[Jiyun] Gu Muqie, Yin Gu. Broken too.
